ygData.subject: Re: Gob Pets in Oasis?
ygData.msgSnippet: They are gone now. Apparently, the EXP was TOO easy. They were only hitting for 40 if that, and I could actually see my experience bar moving in level 30
ygData.messageBody:
They are gone now. Apparently, the EXP was TOO easy. They were only hitting
for 40 if that, and I could actually see my experience bar moving in level
30 (which is sometimes impossible to see since its a barrier level).

Alas, I went back to Oasis AND Lake Rathe, and the doggies are now gone.

Lana


----Original Message Follows----
From: Sean.Clark@...
Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Gob Pets in Oasis?
Date: Thu, 5 Aug 1999 11:12:58 -0600

From: Sean.Clark@...

I just saw a post on one of the Stratics boards concerning an over-run of
Aqua Goblin Pets in Oasis....apparently the wolves are all over the place
for the last few days and giving very easy EXP.
Anybody have any info on this to share???
